info.name: github-domain-scraper
info.summary: This Python package is designed for web crawling through input links that belong to GitHub domains. It offers a wide range of functionalities beyond simple crawling, including the ability to list repositories associated with the provided link, download GitHub repositories, and extract the contents of GitHub repositories.
